beach.name: Bondi Beach
beach.description: A popular beach and the name of the surrounding suburb in Sydney, Australia.

beach.name: Waikiki Beach
beach.description: A beachfront neighborhood of Honolulu, on the south shore of the island of Oahu, in Hawaii, United States.

temple.name: Angkor Wat
temple.description: A temple complex in Cambodia and one of the largest religious monuments in the world.

temple.name: Kinkaku-ji
temple.description: The Golden Pavilion, officially named Rokuon-ji, is a Zen Buddhist temple in Kyoto, Japan.

country.name: Japan
country.description: Japan is an island country in East Asia, located in the northwest Pacific Ocean.

country.name: Italy
country.description: Italy is a European country with a long Mediterranean coastline, has left a powerful mark on Western culture and cuisine.
